channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ford CEO says rare earth supply is ‘day to day’ after plant halt

item.title: One lone passenger survived the deadly Air India crash that killed more than 240: ‘He was disoriented with multiple injuries’
item.description: One passenger who was thrown from the plane survived.

item.title: Shaquille O’Neal must pay $1.8 million to end a years-long class action lawsuit after FTX investors accused him of duping them
item.description: Shaquille O'Neal, and other celebrities like Tom Brady and Stephen Curry, were named in the lawsuit in 2022.

item.title: Israel’s next target is Fordo, a nuclear site hidden in a mountain.
Grieving Relatives of India Air Crash Victims Wait for Bodies to Be Identified
item.description: Families lined up for hours to give DNA samples so the authorities could match names to victims of Thursday’s crash, which killed at least 269 people.
